contents.name: DeviceId
contents.description: Represents the unique ID of the Tributech-SSM-device.

contents.name: PublicKey
contents.description: Represents the current public-key of the device which matches with the current key-pair generated inside the Optiga Trust M chip.

contents.name: SubmitValues
contents.description: Specifies it the submission of telemetry-data is activated or not.

contents.name: SubmitProofs
contents.description: Specifies it the submission of integrity- and origin-verification data is activated or not.

contents.name: Sources
contents.description: Contains all sources of the given agent.
